title: Nightly Business Report - 2008.03.20 - (PDTV.x264.AAC.FOO)
description:
Show: Nightly Business Report
Date: March 20, 2008

==Description==
Stocks soar as commodities continue their slide. Money from the metals
and crude head back into stocks on hopes that the market has turned.
The Dow jumps 261 points and the NASDAQ adds 48 points. Regulators and
lawmakers are turning up the heat on Bear Stearns as questions about
its demise grow. Many are wondering if the Fed took on too much risk
on bailing out Bear. Tonight&#039;s Market Monitor guest liked Bear Stearns
stock on his last visit. We&#039;ll ask John Dorfman, chairman of
Thunderstorm Capital, about that call. THen, with the condo boom gone
bust in many cities, buildiers with projects in the works are
switching gears as they try to attract new buyers.

== Sponsors ==
Franklin Templeton Investments
and Viewers Like You
